Text: The game was in Wroclaw (POL)  at the Municipal Stadium. Sorry for the errror!
No problem, only small error, but huge upload, so great thank you! Will you be doing more games?

thank you Nepotu - the bastards didn't show the game on tv - first time ever i witness that shit... Thank god for you man - still the N*1 in our hearts... 3-3 for Boston - amazing!!! And West ham back in the premiership - Youpiiiiiii!!!! Take care Nepotu - hope you are well - can seed for a few hours... Speak soon...

@2HardRain: U R welcome, bro! Yes I intent that.

As an american (by birth-default), I honor your sharing of what i call Real Football. The opening ceremony preceding Greece v. Poland was amazing! As a 66 y/o, I love being able to watch the action on the pitch. Thank you again for uploading this torrent.
You are welcome, my dear american friend!
